column4: hey dudes, i have one concern, i am setting up a "studio" machine... with ubuntu... it will have 2 lite-on drives, is brasero going to be OK burning 2 mediums at once?
I think that depends on how you have hooked them up
I would give it a try.  If it doesn't work, try enabling immed in Edit > Plugins > wodim > Configure   (I know, it is hidden)
